content:
If you brought a silver/red razor A6 scooter (pictured below) to office hours between 3 and 5pm today (Friday Oct 7) and have realized that the scooter you left with has suddenly grown a standing Appa sticker (also pictured below) on the front, I regret to inform you that you in fact grabbed my scooter. I have yours and would like to trade back so please text me @ 309-340-7676

–Brady Klein
subject: To whoever grabbed my scooter from OH:
